title.rendered: PCB Suggests Team India Matches in One City in Pakistan.

content.rendered:
PCB has suggested the International Cricket Council organize a match between India and the country during the Champions League next year.

The Pakistan Cricket Board, which is expected to host the next edition of the Champions Trophy in 2025, has chosen the three cities of Karachi, Rawalpindi, and Lahore. Which will also win the final, as the venue. used to support the competition. “ICC General Manager Wasim Khan visited Lahore recently where he discussed the CT arrangement with the PCB officials. And it was suggested that the travel schedule of the Indian team should be kept to a minimum,” said a PCB official.

The source added that India may play their first match in the quBoardalifiers in Karachi before traveling to other places for the knockout tournament. With their cricket commitments ending in ICC tournaments, the Indian cricket team has not played in Pakistan since 2008.

The Indian cricket board did not send the national team to the Asian Cup. Wwhich was held in Pakistan and Sri Lanka in a mixed format, last year. Stay updated with the latest news from IPL 2024, including IPL 2024 Orange Cap and IPL 2024 Purple Cap contenders. Check the complete IPL 2024 schedule, IPL 2024 main table and players with sixes, fours, and fifties in IPL 2024.

PCB Chairman Mohsin Naqvi confirmed that all teams will play the Champions Trophy in Pakistan as per schedule.

Read Also: India squad for T20 World Cup 2024 announced.
